name: Avocado Toast
description: Healthy fats and protein-rich satisfying breakfast. Start your day energized.

instructions.instruction: Toast bread slices in toaster or pan until crispy on both sides.
instructions.tip: Crispy bread won't absorb avocado moisture.

instructions.instruction: Cut avocados in half, remove pits, scoop flesh into bowl.
instructions.tip: Ripeness test: Press gently - should yield slightly.

instructions.instruction: Immediately add lemon juice. Add salt and pepper, mash with fork.
instructions.tip: Don't make completely smooth - some chunks add texture.

instructions.instruction: Prep eggs: Add drop of oil to pan, crack eggs and fry sunny-side up.
Place toasted bread on serving plates. Spread avocado mixture evenly on each.
Place one egg on top of each toast.
Arrange cherry tomatoes next to or on top of toast.
Sprinkle red pepper flakes, drizzle olive oil.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve immediately.

tips: Lemon juice prevents browning - add immediately.
Choose whole wheat bread - rich in fiber.
Can add chia seeds or sesame on top.
Works for breakfast or light lunch.
storageInfo: Avocado browns quickly - eat fresh. Don't store prepared.
servingSuggestion: Serve with fresh squeezed orange juice or green tea.
variations: Add smoked salmon for extra protein.
Vegan: Skip egg, add microgreens and cherry tomatoes.
Mexican style: Add jalape√±o and cilantro.
Use poached egg instead of fried.
